items.summary: In the backend, when a user submits a pledge for a project, validate that the total pledged HH (sum of all existing approved + pending pledges for that project, plus the new pledge amount) does not exceed the project's maximum HH budget. If the new pledge would cause the total to exceed the budget, reject it with a descriptive error message.

In the PledgeSection frontend component, display the remaining available HH budget (max HH budget minus total already pledged HH) and disable or prevent submission of the pledge form when the entered amount exceeds the remaining budget. Show a clear inline error or warning when the user attempts to exceed it.
